      public static LocalDate nextOccurrence(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate goalDate, int frequencyInMonth)
      Computes the date of the next occurrence of an event according to the following calculation: deletes as many times as possible the frequency in month to the targeted date while being greater than the start date.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date
      goalDate - The targeted date
      frequencyInMonth - Number of months depicting the frequency of the event
      Returns:
      The date of the next occurrence of the event

      public static boolean dateInPeriod(LocalDate date, int dayBegin, int monthBegin, int dayEnd, int monthEnd)
      Checks if a date is in a specific period.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check
      dayBegin - The start day of the period
      monthBegin - The start month of the period
      dayEnd - The end day of the period
      monthEnd - The start month of the period
      Returns:
      True if the date is in the period, false otherwise

    • getMergedIntervalContainingDay

      public static LocalDateInterval getMergedIntervalContainingDay(Collection<LocalDateInterval> intervals, LocalDate day) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Parameters:
      intervals - list of LocalDateInterval
      day - not null
      Returns:
      a LocalDateInterval object representing the biggest continuous period containing the given LocalDate day & with each day of the interval contained into at least one of the given intervals returns null if there is no given intervals.

      Or null if the given date is before the startDate of the firstInterval or after the endDate of the lastInterval.

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given LocalDate is null

    • getFrenchFormatWithoutYear

      public static String getFrenchFormatWithoutYear(LocalDate day)
      Useful for display in charts for example where the year charge too much the view. E.g. 03/12 for the 3rd of december
      Parameters:
      day - the date to format
      Returns:
      the date without the year in a String

    • getNumberOfNonBusinessDaysBetweenDates

      public static long getNumberOfNonBusinessDaysBetweenDates(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Compute the sum of Saturdays & Sundays in the closed interval defined by the given dates.

      Example:

      • startDate: Sunday 2022-12-18
      • endDate: Sunday 2022-12-25
      • result: 3 (= Sunday 18 + Saturday 24 + Sunday 25)
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the interval
      endDate - the end date of the interval
      Returns:
      the number of non-business days between 2 dates (both included). If the startDate is strictly after the endDate, return the opposite value of the same call with inverted parameters.

    • getLastMonthOccurrenceBoundaries

      public static MonthBoundaries getLastMonthOccurrenceBoundaries(Month targetMonth, LocalDate referenceDate)
      Parameters:
      targetMonth - : given java.time.Month to search boundaries on
      referenceDate - : date from which the result is searched
      Returns:
      a MonthBoundaries object containing the start date and the end date of the first month in the past from the @param referenceDate exclusive corresponding to the given @param targetMonth

    • getNextMonthOccurrenceBoundaries

      public static MonthBoundaries getNextMonthOccurrenceBoundaries(Month targetMonth, LocalDate referenceDate)
      Parameters:
      targetMonth - : given java.time.Month to search boundaries on
      referenceDate - : date from which the result is searched
      Returns:
      a MonthBoundaries object containing the start date and the end date of the first month in the past from the @param referenceDate exclusive corresponding to the given @param targetMonth
